dt: {bc}any of several large northern sea ducks (genera {it}Somateria{/it} and {it}Polystica{/it}) having fine soft down that is used by the female for lining the nest

et: Dutch, German, or Swedish, from Icelandic {it}æthur{/it}, from Old Norse {it}æthr{/it}
shortdef: any of several large northern sea ducks (genera Somateria and Polystica) having fine soft down that is used by the female for lining the nest —called also eider duck
